name: ModifyGroupingRules
description:
Update error tracking grouping rules for a project.

Use this tool to update specific error tracking grouping rules within a project environment on Datadog. It should be called when you need to modify grouping rules for error tracking purposes in a specified project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Retrieve it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: error_tracking_rule_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the error tracking grouping rule to update.

parameters.name: rule_id
parameters.description: The ID of the grouping rule to be updated. Required for specifying which rule to modify within the project.

parameters.name: filters_string
parameters.description: String containing filtering conditions for updating grouping rules. Specify conditions to narrow down rules to be updated.

parameters.name: assigned_user
parameters.description: Specify the user assigned to manage the error tracking rules. It should be the username or ID of the Datadog user.

parameters.name: grouping_rule_order_key
parameters.description: An integer that specifies the priority order of the error grouping rule within a project. Higher values may denote higher priority.

parameters.name: disable_data_filtering
parameters.description: Specifies data filtering rules to be disabled. Provide a string indicating the types of rules or data aspects to disable.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking grouping rule.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking grouping rule.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
